about_the_game:
Damn! They got me!
The screen is covered in blood... But it's too early to throw in the towel!
Use this DLC to obtain unlimited Health!

[Implementing the DLC]
After purchasing this DLC, the new item "Infinite Health" will be added to the Settings menu on the title screen. Turn this on to apply this DLC.

DLC is provided purely for the purposes of enjoyment, and as a means
for users to support the game's developers. It is not needed to clear the game.
